RESOURCE.NAME: Bottom-Up Chart Parser
RESOURCE.COMMENT: This plugin is deprecated, and has been replaced by SUPPLE (http://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/#sec:misc-creole:supple)

PARAMETER.NAME: semanticsSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set for semantic information

PARAMETER.NAME: debug
PARAMETER.COMMENT: To debug or not to debug, that is the question...

PARAMETER.NAME: prologImplementation
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The fully qualified name of the class which will interface with Prolog
